tuv.seg: The Ombudsman for Children
An tOmbudsman do Leanaí
The Ombudsman for Children in Ireland is a statutory office established under the Ombudsman for Children Act 2002
Is oifig reachtúil í an tOmbudsman do Leanaí in Éireann arna bhunú faoin Acht umOmbudsman do Leanaí 2002
The main functions of the Office are:
Is iad príomhfheidhmeanna na hOifige ná:
• To promote the rights and welfare of children and young people up to 18 years old
• Cearta agus leas leanaí a chur chun cinn agus
• To investigate complaints made by children or on behalf of children against public bodies, schools and hospitals
• Chun gearáin a dhéanann leanaí a fhiosrú nó a dhéantar ar son leanaí i leith comhlachtaí poiblí, scoileanna agus ospidéal
Many countries have an Ombudsman for Children
Tá Ombudsman do Leanaí ag cuid mhaith tíortha
A number of these independent offices for children have been established since the adoption of the Convention on the Rights of the Child
Bunaíodh roinnt de na hoifigí neamhspleácha seo ó glacadh leis An Coinbhinsiún um Chearta an Linbh
From 3 April 2017, the Ombudsman can accept complaints about children in Direct Provision
Ó 30 Aibreán 2013, tá an raon comhlachtaí ar féidir iad a imscrúdú leathnú a chlúdach níos mó comhlachtaí agus eagraíochtaí a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí do leanaí thar ceann an Stáit phoiblí
Who does the Ombudsman for Children represent?
Cé a ndéanann an tOmbudsman do Leanaí ionadaíocht orthu?
Under the Act, a child is someone under the age of 18 (however, young people under 18 who are members of the Defence Forces are not represented by the Ombudsman)
Go ginearálta, faoin Acht, is ionann leanbh agus duine atá faoi ocht mbliana déag d’aois ach nach n-áirítear comhaltaí d’Óglaigh na hÉireann atá faoi ocht mbliana déag leis
Which bodies can the Ombudsman for Children investigate?
Cé hiad na comhlachtaí ar féidir leis an Ombudsman do Leanaí iad a imscrúdú?

The Ombudsman for Children can investigate complaints about public bodies providing services or making decisions about children and families, or organisations providing services on behalf of the State

Is féidir leis an Ombudsman do Leanaí imscrúdú a dhéanamh ar ghearáin faoi chomhlachtaí poiblí a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí nó cinntí a dhéanamh faoi leanaí agus do theaghlaigh, nó eagraíochtaí a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí ar son an Stáit
The Ombudsman for Children's Office has developed an unofficial list of the bodies covered (pdf) as a guide
D'fhorbair Oifig an Ombudsman do Leanaí do liosta neamhoifigiúil de na comhlachtaí atá clúdaithe (pdf) mar threoir
How can the Ombudsman for Children promote the rights and welfare of children?
Cén chaoi ar féidir leis an Ombudsman do Leanaí cearta agus leas leanaí a chur chun cinn?

The Ombudsman for Children can provide advice to the Government, encourage the development of policies, practices and procedures to promote children's rights and welfare, highlight issues that are of concern to children and monitor and review the operation of legislation insofar as it refers to children. The Ombudsman for Children can also support children and young people to find out about their rights and how they can be protected and realised

Féadfaidh an tOmbudsman do Leanaí, chun cearta agus leasa an linbh a chur chun cinn, comhairle a chuir ar fáil don Rialtas, forbairt ar bheartais, cleachtais agus nósanna imeachta chun cearta agus leas leanaí a chur chun cinn a spreagadh, béim a leagan ar shaincheisteanna a bhaineann le leanaí agus athbhreithniú agus faireachán a dhéanamh ar oibriú na reachtaíochta chomh fada is a bhaineann sé le leanaí
The Ombudsman for Children may investigate on his own initiative or as a result of a complaint by a child, a family member or a professional who has dealings with the child
Féadfaidh an tOmbudsman do Leanaí imscrúdú a dhéanamh as a stuaim féin nó de thoradh gearáin ó leanbh, ó dhuine den teaghlach nó ó dhuine gairmiúil a mbíonn baint acu leis an leanbh
If a parent is not making the complaint, one parent must be told that a complaint is being made
Muna mbíonn tuismitheoir ag déanamh an gearáin, caithfear a chur in iúl do thuismitheoir amháin go bhfuil gearán á dhéanamh
Before making a complaint to the Ombudsman you must first use the complaints and appeals machinery of the body against whom you have a complaint
Roimh duit gearán a dhéanamh don Ombudsman caithfidh tú sásra achomhairc agus gearán an chomhlachta a bhfuil an gearán agat ina choinne a úsáid ar dtús
If you are not satisfied with the outcome you can then contact the Ombudsman to make your complaint
Muna mbíonn tú sásta leis an toradh féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Ombudsman chun do ghearán a dhéanamh
The Ombudsman may not investigate complaints where legal proceedings have already commenced
Ní fhéadfaidh an tOmbudsman gearán a imscrúdú a bhfuil tús curtha le imeachtaí dlíthiúla ina taobh
To make a complaint you should write to the Ombudsman for Children
Chun gearán a dhéanamh ba chóir duit scríobh chuig an Ombudsman do Leanaí
You should enclose a copy of the letter(s) you sent to the body and give the reasons why you are not satisfied with the outcome of your complaint
Ba cheart duit cóip den litir(reacha) a chuir tú chuig an gcomhlacht a bheith iniata agus luaigh na cúiseanna nach bhfuil tú sásta le toradh do ghearán
You will be contacted by the Office of the Ombudsman who will discuss your complaint with you
Déanfaidh Oifig an Ombudsman teagmháil leat agus déanfar do ghearán a phlé leat
You can also make a complaint online or download a complaint form
Ina theannta sin‚ féadfaidh tú gearán a dhéanamh ar líne nó foirm ghearáin a íoslódáil
